meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kemiyarakaz lra temakesi, musavak na sinsi kana talrevaw, kema na pancang, “katikezir! sungal!”
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kema’izang mi marengay, “’inavayan sinsi.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a temakesi mi mu, tu panadamaw mi kana sinsi za aiyupan. kananta piningaiyan.
In class, the teacher taught us the Pinuyumayan language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: iturus mi kana sinsi miyup, zi semenay mi kana senay na aiyupan.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sazu ku nilrazalrazam nanta piningaiyan.
I have learned many Pinuyumayan languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kana wariwari mukuwa ku i takesiyan, kana wariwari menadanadam ku kanata piningaiyan, rarengay ku pakinger kani inani.
I go to school every day, I learn the Pinuyumayan language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: i Inor nanku ngadan.
My name is Inor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Inor。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: i Asing tu ngadan ni amalri
My dad’s name is Asing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Asing。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: i Sunay tu ngadan ni inani.
My mother’s name is Sunay.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是 Sunay。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: muketrep ku ’ami harem kana ’ami.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ulra i ivalri, i Singkay nantu ngadan, muketrep misama’ za saya nantu ’ami harem.
I have a brother, his name is Singkay, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Singkay，他今年11歲。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mukasa mi temakesi kana maresan na takesiyan.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sahar mi semenay iniyam i ivalri na ma’inayan.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sahar ku melrangulranguya nu katalaulepan, marelrang mi saruma’enan mukuwa melrangulranguya.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sahar ku malrazam za vekal za ’ali’an, karuwa mi mukasa semenasenay zi melrangulranguy.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a alrak ku za Pinuyumayan.
I am an Pinuyumayan child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是卑南族的小孩。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ulra naniyam ruma’ i Mulivelivek.
Our family lives in Mulivelivek.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在初鹿部落。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: lralruwatr mi saruma’enan.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tatelu mi maruwadiyadi.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: i inku, i amalri, i inani, i ivalri na ma’inayan zi i ivalri na vavayan mukasa mi kazu.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tihasar i amalri, a kinsas i intaw.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: varivariw i inani, a ising i intaw.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu kazu i ruma’ i amalri, temarapinuyumayan kimazayar kaniyam.
My father speaks the Pinuyumayan language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kana katalaulepan nu derun murumaruma’ mi i zekalr.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mukasa mi mukuwa kikakiyasa iniyam na ivalri.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sahar ku kananku niruma’enan.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marelrang mi iniyam i inani mukuwa muzangiya harem kana wari.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tremangiyangiya na lingatr a ’uninan, ’azi vi’as zi ’azi lritek na wari, say na vali mu, valiyan.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kemayan mi kana tralutralun mekan za pang, tu ’uninay mi kana ’unin, salaw sadeku.
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a piya kare’alri, demuni’ na lingatr.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kiumalr ku kani inani, kemuda zi demuni’ na lingatr?
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kema i inani, kamawan za zazuwa a variw.
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: uniyan za kutrekutrem na lingatr, mupatraran lra na vitu’en.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: muwaruma’ mi lra.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kiyami ku kana vitu’en i dalan a muwaruma’ mi.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願，

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kiyalrimayan za ’azi zuwa na variw, maranger ku ziya mukuwa muzangiya.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ulra nanku takesiyan i ngidiran i kaniyam, kana wariwari ziya kemakawang ku mukuwa i takesiyan, zi kemakawang muruma’.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ’azi ma’izang naniyam takesiyan, kaitayan na temakakesi, marekalrazam mi mapiya.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: na temakakesi ziya, mareparazuk i renarenazan, mukasa malimali, mazayazayar.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: na sinsiyan mu, mukasa kaniniyam muwazangi kamawan za ma’izang za ruma’ na takesiyan.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: maidap mi kana wariwari ziya, niyam idapay temulre’ay na talrevaw.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ulra na trau mukuwa mitrula za lataw, ulra na maidap za dare’.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: niyam idapay ziya i puyupuyung kana takesiyan, marepuwalraalrang mi mapiya, mukirungetr na takesiyan kana wariwari.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: muruma’ ku i zekalr mukuwa muzangiya kani imu na ma’inayan a daman.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sawariyan mi lra ’azi marepana’u, salaw ku sare’er kanintaw.
We haven't seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mena’u i imu kaninku, tu payasaw ku paekan za taramunah, zi tu pa’auway za kurisepa.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: salaw tavu’ tu sinalem na taramunah ni imu, imaran.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sahar ku ’emau tu kurisepa ni imu, ’inava nu ’emau ta.
I also like grandpa's tea, it's tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kare’alriyan lra, mukasa mi iniyam i imu na vavayan demeru za kare’a’alriyan.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: demeru za sazu za kare’a’alriyan i imu ulra a vulraw, a terukuk, a siyak zi a semuli.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: piya kare’alri, mukuwa mi i sayheng kikulanga.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: melak za sazu za vurasi, za vu’ir zi za rogiyo, urungu muruma’ kema veray kaninku.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kay ku lra kema ku zi zuwa lra muzangiya nu masalr lra ku kuwayaw na imulri.
I said goodbye to them and said I'd see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tu pilralrangaw mi kana sinsi mukuwa i tungwuyuan harem, muturik mi i sulray tremima’ za kippu.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: musavak mi i tungwuyuan mu, merengay na sinsi: “i ngawayan mu a ’aya’ayam, i likuzan mu, a unaunan. uwa na’u inmu mapiya.
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35773/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: makaud ku za unan, semeneng ’azi ku nana’u za unaunan.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mena’u ku za sazu za ’ayam, kazu valriiviiyan kana kawi, mena’u ku ziya za ’alretru kazu kana kawi tu vuwang alrupe’.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ulra a zo, a eva zi a likulraw, ’azi ku ziya mena’u kanani na haramhaman, salaw ku semangal harem.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sazu ku sinasing harem, pana’u kani ama zi kani ina.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu masalr kuwarelrang ku kani ama zi kani ina mukasa zuwa.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kanini na kasede’an, marelrang mi iniyam i ivalri mukuwa muzangiya kani amalri na maralrak.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kemay mi i Tayhok muitras za kisiya mukuwa i Valangaw.
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: meredek lra i Valangaw, i amalri na maralrak na mipalizing zuwa kitrevunga kaniyam.
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ’azi adawilr i siyataw tu ruma’ ni amalri na maralrak nu mipalizing ta dika mu, meredek ta lra.
The station is not far from my uncle's house, and it's just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: adalrep kantu ruma’ ni amalri na maralrak mu, ulra a ma’izang a puwarikanan, marelrang mi mukuwa kana puwarikanan mizidēnsiya.
There is a big ranch near my uncle's house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kazu mi kana puwarikanan, tu pilralrangaw mi ni amalri na maralrak temavur za takulris zi muitras za eva.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a karauv, marelrang mi mukuwa i tokay keraviya.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sazu a palizing i tokay, semeneng miotobay mi mukuwa i kazu.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a muwaruma’ mi, tu trakawaw naniyam otobay zi muitras mi za bas muveruk.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: harem, muruma’ mi lra i Tayhok, ’azi mi malrazam za tu atrevungay lra nantu otobay?
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don't know if my uncle's motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a lralrak mi ziya kaazu mi i Mulivelivek, a temakesi mi lra muasalr mi mukuwa kazuwa i Tawyuan, kazu mi i tokay muvaaw.
When we were young, our family lived in Mulivelivek. After I started school, we moved to Taoyuan and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在初鹿，上學以後，就搬到了桃園，一直在都市裡生活。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: temakesi ku lra kana daygak, mukuwa ku menadanadama za mikireeman kana kakuwayanan kana Yuancumin, malrazam ku lra kana Yuancumin i Taiwan ulra tu kakuwayanan a marekamelrimelri.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: semeneng, mukasa ku kani ivalri na ma’inayan mukuwa kiyumalra kana dawdawan i zekalr. maranger mi malrazam za naniyam kukuwayanan.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: walu pulu’ lra tu ’ami na dawdawan, mawmu, maresan maralralrak ziya nu mena’u ta.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kiyumalr ku kanintaw za sayhu u za emaeman ngai. dalus nu temarapinuyumayan i intaw. sayhu temarabunun, temarapayrang, zi temaradipung.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in pinuyumayan, as well as Bunun, Hokkien and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的卑南語說得很流利，也會說布農語、閩南話和日本話。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ku kiyumalray i intaw mu, malrazam ku lra za a lralrak ziya i intaw mu menanadam za ngai za Dipung. a Bunun tu ’azin, malrazam i intaw za sazu a Payrang i kiyakarunan zi sayhu merengay za kemani sazu za ngai.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Bunun, and he knows many Hokkien at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是布農族人，而他工作上認識許多閩南人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mazayazayar mi mu, merengay na dawdawan za sazu a kinadaman za vulrtrengan za pa’alrupan.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ara ’azi patulru’ay mi malrazam naniyam kiningeran zi, ulra naniyam soci na semasing. maruwa mi ziya kingkinger.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ’azi ku kamalrazam zanta kakuwayanan a lralrak ku ziya. maira ku saema kaninta Yuēncumin.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu kamalrazaman ku sazu lra mu, marakatatena’ a pinuyumayan ku, a kinipilimi’an ku, zi a trau za mamatras.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a pinuyumayan is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為卑南族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kanini na kararauvan, waruma’ lra i wadilri na ma’inayan.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mukasa ku kani imulri na vavayan mukuwa i iciba tremima’a za terukuk. paadang mi demuru za imaran za kararaviyan veray kani wadilri na ma’inayan.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: melavat mi kana menaniwan kana kulang mu, sazu na kulakulang na vukalan ziya.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，有好多新鮮的青菜。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tremima’ mi za takungkung, za tanuvan, zi za ninzing.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kema izu na tawki i ngidiran kana menaniwan kana inaekan na vuwa’ “tavu’ nanku re’a zi na lupas. trima’ za saema mu.”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tremima’ mi za re’a zi za lupas.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: melavat mi kana menaniwan kana ’alum mu, merengay na tawki, “tratrima’ u za eman? semver zi ma’izang na terukuk harem. saya mu, teluwa leman.”
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kapazangalan kema i imulri na vavayan. tu kiyumalray na tawki, “karuwa madulu saema?”
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mawmu kema na tawki madulu lra. ’azi ta marakadulu lra.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kema na tawki na ’udar, alamu trima’i ninku vulraw. ma’izang zi semver ninku vulraw.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又肥。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: talalikuzan lra mu, tremima’ mi lra za terukuk zi za vulraw. muruma’ mi demeru lra za saetu za irupan.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mengangara mi sawariyan zi ’aremeng lra.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: padingwa muruma’ i wadilri na ma’inayan zi merengay maherareher ’azi maruwa semede’ na hitay. palru masalr kana sasede’an mu. karuwa ku lra muruma’.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sazu ku dineruwan lra kema i imulri na vavayan, vinayu mapiya mukasaya ta mekan.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: demaulr mi za wadadiyanan, mukasa ta mekana za karaviyan za merevawan.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ulra ku sanadaman a sasa, mingadan kani Kulas kema. marayas malaalalup murung za emaeman.
I have a classmate named Kulas, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Kulas，他常常忘記帶東西。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu temakesi ta mu, kivulas i initaw za impis, za aitrul, za vavalrayan kana sanadaman.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu parasan, nu parepuwan, nu paretelun mu, taw pavulasay za emaeman na nintaw.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mawmu, ulra tu kakuwayanan na kuwatreng, marayas ’azi pavavuliyas tu kinavulasan.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: talikuzakuzan lra mu, ’azi lra muwai pavulas a trau za emaeman kanintaw.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kana saya wari mu, mukasakasa ta mapiya mukuwa muzangiya.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: maranger mukuwa mutraluna i Kulas kana kalidalanan, mawmu malalup murung za aitrulan.
On the way, Kulas wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Kulas想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kivulas i intaw za aitrulan kana sanadaman, mawmu tremuvang a trau kanintaw za ’azi ku murung i inku.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mahelr zi matrangis i Kulas. ’ilremes zi merengay, “kemuda zi ’azi muwai a trau pavulas za aitrulan kaninku.”
Kulas burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Kulas急的哭了出來。他生氣的說:「為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: merengay na sanadaman kanintaw, halrana ’azi muwai u murung ziyanay, zi ’azi u pavaveliyas na emaeman na pavulas kaninu.
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a dadaman, meredek i Kulas i takesiyan semavalr, tu paveliyasanay lra ni Kulas za emaeman kana kinivulasan na sanadaman.
The next day at school, Kulas arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Kulas很早就到學校了，Kulas把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: irayan kema i Kulas kanantaw sanadaman, zi nu kaidaidan mu, ’azika’a’azi ku murung za emaeman lra. lrayuwan kema ku kanimu za muwai pavulas za emaeman kaninku.
Kulas apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Kulas向同學們道歉，並說:「我以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借我東西。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a ma’alrup i amalri i zekalr.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a lralrak ku ziya mu, mitazaw zi mikuwang muwapatraran nu ’aremeng i amalri zi i amalri na maralralrak.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu ’uninan lra, mirawa muruma’ nazu.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu eman mu a vavuy, nu eman mu a nawan, nu eman mu a ’anavang.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tu sasepadanay zi pa’a’atraranay na rawa kana zinekalranan i uwasavakan kana zekalr.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marayas ku sasakiyaw i amalri, maranger ku kurelrang kani amalri mukuwa ’emalrupa.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu ma’izang ku lra mu, tu pilralrangaw ku lra kema ni amalri.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sayhu mipetrir penetrir za rawa na ma’inayan i zekalr. sayhu demaway za sawail zi za tutak nazu.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sayhu demaway za sawail i amalri. merengay i amalri, “papapetrir za ’anavang i ini. taran’ui tu dinapalran na rawa. papuwa ta za petrir kanantu wakalr.”
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說:「這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: muramawan karuwa dika mukasa kana ma’izangan mukuwa ’emalrupa, menadanadam ku demaway za petrir kana wawariwari. kadika tatena’ mirawa ku petrir kema ku.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mena’u i amalri mu, zi merengay kaninku, nu kaidaidan mu, ’azika’a’azi u a mutuma’alrup za kerevatan.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ma’izang ku lra harem, ku parekaw ku kadalis zi valru’, zi kurelrang ku kani amalri mukuwa penetrira.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: niyam pa’a’atraranay naniyam rawa kana zinekalrnan nu muruma’ mi i zekalr.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: merengay i amalri, sasungal ta kana temuwamuwan zatu ipulu’em, tu parevawaw ta za rawa za sasazu.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: puwari ku mukuwa i takesiyan a ’emanamanan.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a mukuwa i takesiyan mu, malalup ku murung za lravatr.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ’azi ku murung za emaeman.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a temakesi mi mu, kipukasa ku za ku lralrang mena’u za valray.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a kipatalram mi mu, taku pavulasay za impis zi aitrul za ku lralrang.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marengay i sinsi kaninku nu masalr mu dikadika marahan
amanan na puwari lra!""
我今天七點到學校。: The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35773/5: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nanku ’ali’an i sinkay tu ngadan. alrak za pinuyumayan i intaw.
My good friend’s name is sinkay, and he is also an  pinuyumayan child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫sinkay，他也是卑南族的小孩。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mukasa mi temakesi i Likavung.
We study together in the Likavung tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在利嘉村讀書。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marayas mi mukasa kingkinger tu vinavatiyan na dawdawan na vativatiyan, sayhu mi temarapinuyumayan mapiya.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the pinuyumayan proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說卑南語。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: tihasar zi semever ku, alusu zi varivariw i singkay.
I am tall and overweight, while singkay is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，singkay很矮也很瘦。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: salaw mivaawan i singkay, zi sahar mi mapiya kantaw.
singkay is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: singkay很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ’a’ari’ariyan i takesiyan harem kana wari, maanay za sazu na marepakuwakuwa i takesiyan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ulra a makakezeng za tali, tremapi’i / ’eresur za mali, pavekas, muwarak zi papana ’an.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mare’ari’ari ku za pavekas.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a pavekas ku mu, kuretapelra’ ku, ku tuzu mudara’ / mudamuk za sazu.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mawmu marahan ku, zi patrutru mungawayan pavekas.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: meredek ku kana raredekan mu semangal na trau mapiya.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ara ’azi ku muelak za sanga, mawmu salaw ku semangal, ’alra na piya ku lra kana mare’ari’ari.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marelrang mi iniyam i amalri mukuwa muzangiya kani ama na maralrak a daman.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mavuli’ tu kuwi ni ama na maralrak.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marengay kaniyam i intaw, mutravelrang tu sa’uv na ruma’.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a temulre’ay kana sa’uv i intaw mu, mutani kemay kana sa’uv.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: miinurung za ’alum na hung zi za puran i amalri veray kani ama na maralrak.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: i inku zi i ama na maralrak mazayazayar mi i kiya’ezengan, marengay za sazu za vativatiyan i intaw.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a uwaveruk ku mu, tihasar u lra, zi marekavangsar u lra kema kaninku i ama na maralrak.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marengay ku, “nu ’inava lra tu kuwi ni ama na maralrak mu, alamu ziya i kaniyam muzangiya.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35773/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kazu kana 2022 ’ami, pakaygi na séhu kana karuwa pusavak za tu ngadan na ’atayan i mibunsiyo na Yécumin.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kiumaumalr ku lra kani Avarang mawna vangesaran i zekalr na sawariyan kiyami pakirev kana séhu za “pusavakaw za tu ngadan na ’atayan.” i mibunsiyo.
I interviewed Avarang, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Avarang。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kanini na kasede’an i inku zi i intaw makakuret mi kana auwa kanantu ruma’ kiumaumalr kantaw.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kazu kana kiumaumalran mu, pakalrazam kaninku zatu pinarevuwa’ tu ngadan, zi kirekalrazam ku tu niruma’enan, zi nantu zekalr.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: kiumalr ku kantaw kemuda zi marukerang patrutru kana puwavalis za ngadan, a awatr ziya na ipuvalray ’azi ’inava ziya maw?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marengay kaninku i intaw, ’alrana pimanayaw za valray na minkuk ’azi karuwa patulre’ay paredek za tu ngadan, nu venavina a trau kantaw mu “izu i... eman” kema, zi mawna kemazu mupana lra a kalikeliked na sime’an na ngai.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \izu i... eman
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35773/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫「izu i... eman」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: marengay i Avarang, “na vinavalray kanantu valray na Yéncumin na ngadan mu maw tatena’ nanta ngadan. nanku ngadan paruveli kananta ’inalrayan, nanta niruma’enan, nanta kinayanan, kiyalriman kana kazuwan ta mawan atrevung tu ngadan i intaw.”
Avarang said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35773/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Avarang說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: a daman marelrang mi iniyam i mulri na vavayan mukuwa kana kazuwan na trau puwayar meniwana, i mulri na vavayan mu miinurung za sazu za tu sinalem na kulang, zi demaway ziya kana imaran na akanan na Yéncumin veray kana mapiyapiya.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: sahar mapiya tu puwaayaran meniwan ni i mulri na vavayan, kazuwan na trau na tremima’ tu kamangulr zi la’ula’usan, zi kazuwan na trau na temalram tu inevel na irupan.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和車輪茄很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: salaw imaran tu dineru na pa’at zi tinaveras, ulra ziya na ’alum za vavuy tu pukasayaw za tana’ demeru, kazuwan na lavang na mukezeng kanantu ngulringulran, zuwa muturika mapiya kana puwaayaran meniwan i kaniyam.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: nu demeru za eman i mulri na vavayan mu, kazu ku i saninin demadaulr kana lavang, kematamuni ku ’emuy’uy i ngaydiran, “taw sinalem na lulang peniya, ’azi pinuwatremel, kadika alamu tremima’a mu!”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35773/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: dika mi piya meniwan naniyam emaeman, “’alrana mau i inu na puwalrang.” kema i mulri na vavayan.
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: ini na kahuwahuwan mu, kipanadam ku lra kanizu na tematelriw ziya i dare’ kana Yécumin zi kalrazaman za akanan, pawnung atalram lra tu ulepan za puwayar meniwan.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

meredek ku i takesiyan a pituwa tuki har: mena’u lra kani i mulri na vavayan tu kinasahasahar na akanan na trungulran, paremamatras ku zi salaw ku semangal.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
